dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement - www.momotyan.com
dmca.body:
EN - also, forward these attachments.


-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, November 05, 2004 7:33 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement - www.momotyan.com


Forwarding to Legal for review.

-- 
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Gary Berzner <gary.berzner@etimesltd.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Friday, November 5, 2004, 7:06:25 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement - www.momotyan.com

===8<==============Original message text===============
To Whom It May Concern:

Please see the attached notices of copyright infringement.


Gary A. Berzner
601 S. Figueroa Street, 50th Floor
Los Angeles, CA 90017
Tel: (213) 452-6734    Fax: (213) 622-5184

gary.berzner@etimesltd.com

This email is intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is
addressed and may contain information that is privileged, confidential or
otherwise exempt from disclosure under applicable law.  If the reader of
this email is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent
responsible for delivering the message to the intended recipient, you are
hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution, or copying of this
communication is strictly prohibited.  If you have received this
communication in error, please immediately notify us by telephone and return
the original message to us at the listed email address.  Thank you.

===8<===========End of original message text===========
